This movie is about a gang of Italian-American youth who live in lower Manhattan. They grow up with each other and their neighborhood, but one day they become enemies.

The main character of the movie is Michael Corleone (Dustin Hoffman), who grew up as the son of two Italian immigrants who settled in New York City. He eventually becomes a successful lawyer and business owner, who earns millions of dollars through his various companies.
